Replies.Reply: A large empty coach, all dull beige seats and wood veneer, makes its way along a stretch of motorway.
Suddenly he ducks down and nips through an opening in a fence, making a short cut.
I'm sweet... come in, man, come in.
Good to see you too, geezer.
Mate, neither have I... I just got back from some girls yard.
No, no... just some fucking booty call.
In case of emergency's, man... you know it.
Were you on just one bus?
I've got a few things to do today geezer, you can stay here if you want, just chill out.
Or you can come with me?
I pay you fucking rent don't I?
What have you got, rent or mortgage?
I invited him to a party.
You remember Rachel, you fucking lunged her at Jazzbo Browns?
I wouldn't mind if he did it discreetly, but he lunged her from about three feet.
You can come along if you want.
Mate, you haven't... you haven't paid me for last week yet?
Meet me at the top of the road by the telephone box.
Don't ever fucking come to my house again.
Nothing, geezer wanted to talk to me about a job.
I'm going to this fucking party.
Actually, let's go out the back way, it'll be quicker.
...Do you know they've ignored me for about a year...
...my mum puts the phone down when she hears my voice...
My dad crosses the road if he sees me in the street, then they fucking summon me for a fucking job interview.
They just want me to meet some up-
Give it a fucking rest geezer.
Chill out, he's an old mate of mine.
What? Magnus never wants me to call him.
What's the matter, what did he say?
...the paramedics had to peel her off.
I didn't wanna drag you around all day.
Valerie, this is Chris, he's erm, he's an old friend of mine, we grew up together. He's cool. We go way back. So it's cool, you know.
I called yesterday but you were out.
I dunno, It was probably about two in the afternoon.
Look Val we're gonna have to do one...
Where do you get your weed from?
Where d'you get your fucking weed from rude boy?
From now on you get your weed from me...
I'm gonna sell you your weed half price, and your gonna keep this noise down.
Because if I hear one word of complaint from next door, just one single complaint, I'll come back here and I'll take your TV, I'll take your stereo, and I'll shove em up your birds arse.
Call me if you need any more weed.
She's been doing drugs longer than we've been alive.
I dunno, about...three, three and a half years ago.
Why when d'you stop knocking out pills.
I have to charge you wholesale, you know. I got family in Pakistan, they need ticket for plane travel, man.
I thought it'd be a surprise.
I dunno, lot of her new mates, I don't know many of them.
I thought you worked in recruitment.
When do you become a fucking family liaison?
I'll be stuck in some fucking warehouse... looking after twenty Bengalis... knocking out dodgy Fruit of the Looms.... I know exactly who they want me to meet, man.
I've got a sweet little earner.
Only if you get caught, mate.
Malik, this is an old mate of mine, Chris.
Where are you going, man why you running?
What... are you on your way there now?
Yeah, but I wouldn't mate... I don't want to... I'm perfectly fucking happy where I am...
If Manchester's so full of gal, how come you haven't got a bird yet?
Mate, that was four years ago.
People were saying a lot of shit about both of us.
I don't know mate. Whatever they were saying about you they were saying about me.
You fucking know that... back to mine... bit of munch... couple of Uri Geller's...
Mate, last time you drank a bottle of whisky you pissed on my leg.
I gotta do one last drop off and we can chill out.
Yeah but I'm a Muslim drug dealer...
You alright mate... you sound a bit down?
Is that still job thing still on?
Alright mate, I was just asking.
I've been busy, mate. You alright?
There's nothing left Trev, that's why I haven't answered?
Mate, I'm in a rush, I'll call you later.
Take it easy rude boy. Just chill out.
I've had a long fucking day, Trevor, just leave me alone.
Just leave it, Chris. Trevor, think about what you're doing, man.
Trevor, you need to calm down.
It's a bit fucking late now.
Yeah exactly mate. Help might have been fucking nice, do you know what I mean?
You're supposed to fucking help me, man, fucking do something.
I'm surprised you didn't do a fucking runner?
Why, why, cos I'm speaking the truth. Talking about the past, talking about Serena. Oh no you can't talk about that, you mustn't talk about Serena.

Let's fucking talk about it. Let's talk about how you left two weeks after she died without saying goodbye to me, everyone fucking asking me what's going on, every one saying shit about you, bad mouthing you, let me tell you about the fights I had sticking up for you, the broken nose I got when some meathead slagged you off, let's fucking talk about that, mate.
How would I you prick I haven't seen you for four years.
whatever your problem is with him that's nothing to do with me... Why you even use that prick... I...
I need it Rez, where is it?
Rez, Rez, I need that bag...
Rez, if you don't give it to me I'm a dead man.
Fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck...
What the fuck have you done, what the FUCK have you done?
Look man, I'm not gonna do this party...
I've got too much shit to deal with.
You don't have to come with me.
Fucking hell, man. I thought you were gonna leave me cold.
There's only so much one man can take.
I need to talk to you about something.
Mate, I'll only be a minute.
Yeah well he went mental, saying some other shit about me cutting it up, mixing the coke, he was saying all sorts of... bullshit...
Why would he be saying that...
Perhaps you should phone him up now, here, in front of me, tell him it's all bollocks.
Go on mate, call him up, tell him that I don't cut up the coke.
What are you talking about you prick?
What the FUCK are you going about.
gear all along. Selling half of it to the fucking Turks, cutting out Magnus.
I didn't think of it, cos I'm not that fucking stupid.
Don't worry about it, I'm fucking leaving.
Mate, just leave it the geezers a wanker.
Chris I can't. I'm not leaving...
If they did you'd be in prison mate?
We were all pretty fucked Chris.
Chris if it wasn't you, she would have got it from someone else mate.
We've been chased by the police...
And my brother flushed my gear down the toilet...
Party was blinding though weren't it?
I didn't think of it, cos I'm not that fucking stupid.
Yeah I just needed to splash my face, freshen up a bit.
You always loved your titties, bruv.
No, no, that's sweet mate, whatever.
Yeah... no sorry, two. I had to change at Luton.
Does your brother know you keep those there?
How you doing Rez, good to see you, man?
My pants cost more than your education.
I take it this doesn't happen often.
Yeah. Was it? Yeah, four years ago I think.
What, work wise? I'm in recruitment.
Yeah, yeah, you went in for the kill and she lent away like she was doing the fucking limbo.
You couldn't even remember who she was five minutes ago.
Because of the, erm, because of the party...
I dunno, I just wanted to see Shifty didn't I.
We gonna see your mum and dad later?
I just heard... erm... I wasn't being nosey, I just heard Rez...
Geezer don't worry about, just...don't worry about it, it's cool, I'm alright.
Was that Loretta Martin in that motor?
I used to fancy her big time when we were kids.
She fucking... she loves a wrong'un though don't she?
I can't stand people who feed their cat's... fucking red snapper... or goose liver, because they say the fucking things fussy...
Starve the fucking thing for a week and it'll eat a condom, do you know what I mean...
You don't miss a fucking trick.
That was all a bit fucking surreal.
I can't believe you just sold crack to Miss Marple and struck a deal with Blazing Squad.
When did you start knocking out?
Only if I get a fucking discount.
Who else is gonna be there?
So what's the plan, are you gonna go and see your mum and dad first?
You should go man, see what they've got to say?
What are you talking about you nutter, I was just saying?
It might not be, mate, it might be some sweet little earner... in the city somewhere, do you know what I mean.
Yeah, but you won't be sweating bullets everytime the door bell goes.
You're not knocking out weed anymore, man.... This aint college... you're in deep bruv...
Hold up, hold up...Why are you running?
Mate, I'm telling you, this is no way to live.
I'm serious, mate, you need to get away from this shit, come and live with me for a bit.
You'd love Manchester, man, it's full of fitness.
I've been on nuff dates. Some of them fucking lovely.
I just haven't been able to get my head around it since Serena.
Did you go to the funeral?
Did you get drilled by the old bill?
What did people say when I left?
I'm gonna get fucking lick-shot tonight.
Let's get a bottle of whisky.
I used to go there, what do you do?
I could fucking smash one of your mum's curry's.
Do you think she would have made food?
We could still make it, man.
Mate, I'm only trying to help.
Mate, the geezer had a fucking knife at your throat.
What was I supposed to do?
Mate, I'm sorry, I'm just not used to being fucking mugged in tunnels.
Fuck you, Shifty. Fuck you, man.
I left because of one fucking reason... this shit hole...

this fucking cess pit that you love so much... where has this place got you, man, where has it fucking got you, smartest kid in the class, four fucking a levels and you're getting chased by the police, getting mugged, selling crack cocaine to OAP's. Nice life.
You don't know what the fuck I've been through.
Yeah, cool, I'll probably just grab my stuff from yours then.
As if I'm not gonna come with you nutter.
I thought you were used to it.
What the fuck did I do?
We should just go, man, get the fuck out of this shithole, leave now, go to Manchester, tonight, I'm telling you.
Does everyone think it was me?
I can't even remember giving it to her.
She told me she'd done pills before.
Yeah but she didn't did she.
Jesus Christ man what the fuck are you doing?
Fucking hell, man, this is bullshit.
Fuck the party. I never wanted to go anyway.
... she's living like a drifter babe, I'm telling you, she's split... sort of... with Stefan... I know she did...
Babe, I'm cooking you some eggs...
Oh... what... nothing, Trevor's just walked out without touching his breakfast... I don't know, I thought so anyway...
And why didn't you touch your breakfast?
I want to start getting stuff ready for next week - where's the grey suitcase?
It's all right babe I'll get it.
Babe it's fine, I'll get it down.
I want to book a hire car.
How are we gonna get about with two kids.
It'll be cheaper to get a hire car.
Don't ruin this for me, Trevor.
Don't ruin this holiday for me.
Well what should I do about the car?
I've got two kids to pack for...
Where do you think they are, they're in bed?
When did you start using again?
When did you start using cocaine again?
I'm not going through this again Trevor, don't fucking lie to me.
Is that why the card failed.
I tried to book a car and the card failed?
scaffolding... cos coked off you're just off you're fucking tits.
What did I say to you Trevor, I said as god is my witness, I'll walk out of that door with my kids and never look back...

You promised me you'd stopped, You swore on your baby daughter's life that you were clean, Trevor. You swore on our nine-month old baby daughter's life that you wouldn't touch that... that shit anymore.

No, don't you cry, don't you dare fucking cry, because to me that's even more repulsive. I want you to be a man for Christ's sake. I want you to be a fucking man about this, Trevor, for once in your life take control of the FUCKING situation.
TREVOR WHAT IS IT? PHONE THE POLICE!
You were gassing away to Nicola...
What? I can't hear you babe.
I'll find it when I get home.
Jasmine, I'll get it when I get home.
I'LL FIND THE FUCKING THING WHEN I GET HOME.
I was trying to bell you geezer, your phones off.
Do me a favour, I've probably put your fucking kids through college, do you know what I mean?
Yeah, no worries, I'm sorry, man.
Bob please I've paid out on all the materials, I've lost money.
YOU OWE ME MY FUCKING MONEY.
Jasmine, we're not getting a hire car.
Where do you think. I'm on site.
Babe, I've gotta go, Bob's calling me... we'll talk about it later...
No, no, no, no, oh fuck, oh fucking hell.

Ken, it's Trevor... yeah I'm alright mate... yeah, no, not for about a week... Look I can't get hold of Shifty... I know, I know he's a nightmare... you haven't got any various have ya... what you're dry as well... I know... I know but I can't get hold of him... alright mate... look if you see him yeah, get him to call me straight away...
Get in and show me where to find him, you know where he hangs out.
Don't worry about it, we'll only be about ten minutes.
Get in the FUCKING car Malik.
Where you been geezer, I've been trying to get hold of you.
I need to get hold of some gear.
You won't answer your phone mate, you've been blanking me all day.
Fuck off, I know you're carrying, don't try and mug me off.
I am fucking chilled out, I just don't like being mugged off, do you know what I mean?
Empty your pockets! EMPTY YOUR FUCKING POCKETS.
Why do you lie to me you prick, why do you tell me you weren't fucking carrying.
And the inside pockets you prick...
JESUS MALIK... what are you doing?
We've got another three days yet?
What are you going on about?
I told you not book it.
I'm not off my tits babe.
Motherfucker, the return of the white man.
I wondered why I could hear voices.
You look like a rent boy.
That top cost more than my education.
You know what, I'm emotional, where's my camera, bring me my camera. Quick, man, quick.
Do you think I've put on weight?
Do you think I've put on weight?
I told you I haven't put on that much weight.
How long since you've been back?
Is that the last time I saw you, fucking hell?
some work, four A-levels and no job.
I'm asking the questions padre... for your information... no, I'm not...
Why do you leave without saying goodbye to my brother?
I need info, man. I'm like a sponge, do you know what I mean, I'm like a flannel... How come your back, what's the deal?
You boys need to get your facts straight... she fucking lunged me.
Yeah, I feel like it now, don't I... fucking hell...
Get that, it's probably your viagra delivery.
So come on, why are you back...
There's been hundreds of parties mate, what's so special about this one?
For some reason... I dunno why...
Why don't you try acting like one.
You can be there at seven.
Of course it is. Why wouldn't it be.
Where the FUCK have you been?
Where the fuck have you been... why didn't you phone mum and dad?
Why didn't you use a pay phone?
Where is it? Where the fuck is it.
I looked after you Shifty, I took you under my roof, let you live in my house, and this, this is how you repay me...
Get out of my fucking house, get out...
Get the FUCK out of my house.
What you saying you fucking rag-
You been on the roids mate you're looking bigger?
You getting ready for a fucking uprising.
We better be careful, seems like there's a Tally-barn in town.
How you doing mate, you alright?
Don't just bring any fucking Muppet to the party, at least let me know first, do you know what I mean, give me a fucking heads up.
Anyway, I've got, erm, I've got a message for you.
Magnus wants you to call him tonight?
I fucking... I swear I know you from somewhere?
I do, I know you from somewhere.
D'you used to knock out pills?
Yeah, yeah, I know where I fucking know you from... you used to go out with Serena Ellis?
You'd fucking hope so, she's dead you cunt.
Don't go blowing up any fucking tube trains.

state him... I mean mate, they're all on the make... he's a fucking Paki ain't he... he'd sell his sister for a set of rims, do you know what I mean... That you've lost all his gear...

...Shooting off your fucking mouth, telling me what you're gonna do to Magnus... telling me how you're gonna take him down...

Couldn't show your face after what you did.
Get the fuck out of my house.
Or what... you gonna kill me like you did Serena.

Give me a fucking break I'm rushing my tits off...
Let's just go Lenny. I'm freaking out.
Glen, I'm not in the mood.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no...

Thank's for coming today Trevor, we'll definitely be in touch.
No, no I was awake, I didn't sleep.

But I was in here at two.
Yeah, I'm alright babe, you alright?
No... not for a long time, Shifty... not seen her for a long time really, darling.
It aint... it aint mine, my erm, my mate left it, he left it here... I could phone him if you want, he'll sort you out...
I get it from this geezer... Glen Dowdy innit.

Yeah, yeah, it's cool, I'm sorry, man, I didn't know I had it on loud, I would have turned it down, I'm sorry.
Fucking hell Shifty... you alright bruv... I didn't even notice you.
Fucking hell, do you remember I was telling you about Craig?
Yeah you fucking do, Craig Whittle, the guy who's seeing Desmond Dodge's sister.
Yeah, yeah. D'you remember I told you he had that job at the pinnacles, the, erm, storage warehouse.
Anyway, Craig tells me every Friday, on the fucking dot, a delivery gets made, all this top fucking electrical gear...

fucking drop off, but because the lorry can't reverse into the courtyard, something to do with the angle of the gates or something, I dunno mate, you'll have to ask Craig, they fucking, cos they can't get in, they leave all these crates sitting on the fucking road...

What... no, no, no, I drummed the place ten minutes ago blood. This fucking... forklift went inside yeah, with this first load, so I, fucking, I nipped in, started whacking in the gear, only turns out they've got another forklift...
Cunt caught me right in the middle a loading up.

This morning, why what's the matter, what's going on?
